value.title: DAX Fridays! #138: INT, NOT EMPTY | Cascading slicers
value.excerpt: In today's video I will review a question I got on my youtube comments: How do I do cascading slicers in Power BI? Happy Friday!! #curbal #dax #daxfridays #powerbi  Links mentioned in the video: SQLBI 1: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/syncing-slicers-in-power-bi/  SQLBI 2: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/check-empty-table-condition-with-dax/

value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX? value.title: DAX Fridays! #91: Sum child values into the parent
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to sum child values into the parent when you are dealing with hierarchies in Power BI.
